emailTakenErrorText: Account with such email already exists
accessDisabledErrorText: Access to this account has been temporarily disabled
wrongOrNoPasswordErrorText: The password is invalid or the user does not have a password
provideEmail: Provide your email and we will send you a link to reset your password
forgotPasswordHintText: Provide your email and we will send you a link to reset your password
passwordResetEmailSentText: We've sent you an email with a link to reset your password. Please check your email.
